name: Wastelands
description: Barren, lifeless terrain offers no resources or shelter, creating extreme survival challenges. The lack of water and vegetation makes long-term habitation impossible, while the harsh conditions can preserve ancient ruins or artifacts.
atmosphere: Barren ground stretches endlessly under a merciless sun while heat waves create shimmering mirages. Cracked earth and scattered bones mark this lifeless expanse. The bone-dry air carries only dust and despair. Nothing grows in this forsaken landscape except perhaps hardy cacti or thorny shrubs.
